thread.section_title: Technology news, features, analysis and commentary - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Storyline

author: Dave Murphy
title: Storyline
text: In a nutshell: The free iOS app from Mark Cuban’s Xpire gives you alternative — and often better — ways to read tweets from the last several hours. It’s separate from Twitter, sorting by tweeters’ names rather than chronologically. You can sort alphabetically or by categories like most recent, most unread or most influential. It’s easy to include people in a list of top users, or remove them.
